definition: to rise/to ascend/to climb (airplane etc)/to go up (sales figures etc)/to gain promotion
to crawl/to climb/to get up or sit up
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]
variant of 升[sheng1]/to ascend/to rise in rank

sentences.english: You control pitch and roll with the accelerometer.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通过重力感应控制飞机俯冲和爬升。

sentences.english: You can understand why this stock has climbed off its lows.
sentences.chinese: 这下你明白为什么这只股票能够从低谷爬升上来了。

sentences.english: You hear this whoosh and away the elevator climbs.
sentences.chinese: 在电梯爬升的时候，你听到“呼呼”的风声。

sentences.english: Calibrated rate of climb gauges on all Spitfires.
sentences.chinese: 校准爬升率仪表对所有在兰斯举行。

sentences.english: But I could feel your tears cause you are in lineage 2 adena me.
sentences.chinese: 拥有足够宗谱2爬升在游戏中更重要的是，你可能想。

sentences.english: The Nikkei is also climbing mostly upwards.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，日经指数也正在向上爬升。

sentences.english: Many of La Paz's residents swear the snow-line is gradually creeping upwards.
sentences.chinese: 许多拉巴斯市的居民发誓雪线在逐渐爬升。

sentences.english: The four-week moving average climbed to 469, 000.
sentences.chinese: 四周移动平均值爬升到46万29千。

sentences.english: The plane climbed until it was clear of the clouds.
The cause of his death was determined to be drowning due to air embolism, rapid ascent and insufficient air.
sentences.chinese: 死亡原因判定为空气栓塞溺水，迅速爬升氧气不足。

sentences.english: Anti-theft bolts are up to 1m above anti-climbing device.
sentences.chinese: 反偷窃螺栓是高达1米以上反爬升装置。

sentences.english: The cause of death was listed as " air embolism due to rapid ascent, insufficient air."
sentences.chinese: 死亡原因列为“迅速爬升氧气不足导致的空气栓塞。”

sentences.english: SO THE price of oil is creeping back up towards a record high.
sentences.chinese: 石油价格又在向着新纪录爬升了。

sentences.english: They are not weightless, they are climbing up.
sentences.chinese: 他们还有重量，此时飞机在爬升。

sentences.english: Cable automatic climbing was the key problem of the maintenance robotization for in-service cables.
sentences.chinese: 缆索自动爬升是在役缆索维护机器人化的最关键问题。

sentences.english: The cause of death was listed as "drowning due to air embolism, rapid ascent and insufficient gas."
sentences.chinese: 死亡原因列为“空气栓塞溺水，迅速爬升氧气不足。”

definition: to dive down fast/to swoop down
to slide/to coast/to glide/(of an aircraft) to taxi
to climb/to pull oneself up/to clamber/to scale/fig. to forge ahead in the face of hardships and danger
the front (nose) of a plane etc
to clamber up/(of prices etc) to rise
